tv.generator-info-name: WebGrab+Plus/w MDB & REX Postprocess -- version V5.3.0.0 -- Jan van Straaten

programme.title: JAG: Silent Service
programme.desc: Mac and Harm are having trouble relating...a result of working together under stress for so long.(n)

programme.title: JAG: King of the Greenie Board
programme.desc: Harm is now a Tomcat division commander aboard the carrier USS Patrick Henry that is patrolling the Mediterranean near Yugoslavia.(n)

programme.title: JAG: Rules of Engagement
programme.desc: The Russians are furious over the killing of their peacekeepers and the Navy sends Mac, Brumby, and Roberts to the Patrick Henry to conduct the court-martial of Lt. Buxton.(n)

programme.title: JAG: True Calling
programme.desc: When a petty officer smuggles a pregnant Serbian woman aboard the carrier in order to save her from a vengeful fiancée, he's arrested and scheduled to be court-martialed.(n)

programme.title: JAG: Psychic Warrior
programme.desc: When a Navy research project involving ESP and psychic phenomenon goes awry, resulting in the death of one of the research subjects, the Admiral in charge is court-martialed.(n)

programme.title: Scorpion: It's Raining Men (Of War)
programme.desc: On Thanksgiving, Team Scorpion's new neighbor, Florence \, joins them at sea on a mission to destroy a floating island of trash, but her flawed contribution leaves her, Walter and Happy stranded on the quickly dissolving island.(n)

programme.title: Scorpion: Crime Every Mountain
programme.desc: As Cabe's trial looms over Team Scorpion, a simple case goes sideways when they help a father and his daughter whose plane crashes nearby.(n)

programme.title: Scorpion: Who Let the Dog Out ('Cause Now It's Stuck in a Cistern)
programme.sub-title: Who Let the Dog Out ('Cause Now It's Stuck in a Cistern)
programme.desc: As Team Scorpion anxiously awaits the verdict of Cabe's trial which could send him to prison, they focus their nervous energy on trying to save a dog stuck in a cistern.(n)

programme.title: Scorpion: A Christmas Car-Roll
programme.desc: On Christmas Eve, when Walter chooses work over spending quality time with his friends, he falls down the stairs and hits his head, and as he lays unconscious, he enters a dream world where Team Scorpion never existed.(n)

programme.title: Scorpion: The Bunker Games
programme.desc: Team Scorpion must work with Toby's nemesis, Quincy Berkstead and his wife, Amy , when they are locked inside an artificially intelligent doomsday bunker that aims to kill them.(n)

programme.title: Scorpion: Lighthouse of the Rising Sun
programme.desc: A solar storm knocks out power in Los Angeles, and Team Scorpion must help a teen pilot and his girlfriend who are lost over the Pacific without navigation or radio contact.(n)

programme.title: Rookie Blue: A Real Gentleman
programme.desc: When Traci is a no-show for her first raid, 15 Division fears the notorious gun dealer they’re after has kidnapped her. But when Andy realizes that the serial rapist we never caught is back, it’s all hands on deck to find Traci.(n)

programme.title: Rookie Blue: Home Run
programme.desc: After a community-outreach baseball game erupts in a drive-by shooting, Gail’s relationship with her brother is put to the test . Meanwhile, Swarek plans a getaway with Andy up to Oliver’s cabin, which goes off the rails in every possible way.(n)

programme.title: Rookie Blue: Best Man
programme.desc: Andy and Sam are shocked to learn that Oliver is the prime suspect in IA’s corruption investigation into 15 Division. They only have until end of day today to find Chris Klem – the missing explosives-dealer – and clear Oliver’s name.(n)

programme.title: Rookie Blue: Integrity Test
programme.desc: With Oliver still the prime suspect in the bombing of 15’s evidence room, Andy, Dov, Gail, and Nick undertake a risky – and potentially career-ending – plan to prove that Commissioner Alonso Santana is corrupt.(n)

programme.title: Rookie Blue: Ninety Degrees
programme.desc: Andy heads out with a very-pregnant Marlo to find a volatile woman who’s gone missing after group therapy, but neither Andy nor Marlo are prepared when Marlo suddenly goes into labor.(n)

programme.title: Rookie Blue: Breaking Up the Band
programme.desc: Now that Sam and Marlo’s baby girl has arrived (Ep. 520), it’s clear nothing could have prepared Andy for this moment. So when Juliet offers Andy an opportunity to leave town for 4 months on an undercover project, Andy starts to consider it.(n)

programme.title: Most Haunted: Codnor Castle Part 2
programme.desc: We stay with the team and find out what happened after we left them last time. The\nforeboding Codnor Castle Cottage maintains its attack on the Most Haunted team with\ndramatic effect causing Yvette calls an early end to their night in Hell House.(n)

programme.title: Most Haunted: Dudley Castle
programme.desc: The ruins that make up Dudley Castle house a plethora of paranormal activity for Yvette and\nher team to investigate. Strange noises and a violent poltergeist await them as they turn the\nlights out and do battle with the unseen forces.(n)

programme.title: Most Haunted: Llanfyliln House Part 1
programme.desc: Workhouses were not the best of places to be, so why would anyone stay after they had\ndied? Yvette takes her team on a memorable journey to find out. For a few team members\nit was a night they will never forget as they are pushed to the very limits.(n)

programme.title: Most Haunted: Llanfyliln House Part 2
programme.desc: Whatever was making itself known to the team earlier, continues in this episode as\nsomething seems to be following Yvette from the shadows.(n)

programme.title: Most Haunted: The Moat House Part 1
programme.desc: This time Yvette and her team ventures into the dark abyss of the cellars under this large\ncountry house. Without exception every member of the team experience something\nunexplained as the darkness starts to come to life.(n)

programme.title: Ghost Hunters: Spirits of the Night
programme.desc: On this episode of Ghost Hunters,TAPS visits the home of the Scully family, who are so terrified they are ready to pack up and move.(n)

programme.title: Ghost Hunters: Episode 2
programme.desc: Despite mysterious and unnerving warnings from locals, the Ghost Hunters face their fears and stay on mission: to help people confront terrifying paranormal encounters that have shaken them to their core.(n)

programme.title: Ghost Hunters: Ghosts From Hale
programme.desc: On this episode of Ghost Hunters, TAPS travels to Coventry, Connecticut to investigate the Nathan Hale Homestead. Nathan Hale was an American Patriot who fought in the Revolutionary War and was executed by the Britishfor being a spy.(n)

programme.title: Ghost Hunters
programme.desc: Despite mysterious and unnerving warnings from locals, the Ghost Hunters face their fears and stay on mission: to help people confront terrifying paranormal encounters that have shaken them to their core.(n)

programme.title: Ghost Hunters: Mark Twain House
programme.desc: TAPS is called to the former home of one of the world's most famous authors in order to investigate a series of startling paranormal occurrences.(n)

programme.title: Ghost Hunters: Darker Learning
programme.desc: On this episode of Ghost Hunters, TAPS has been called to investigate Southern Vermont College in Bennington, Vermont. The legend of a mysterious love triangleand suicidescould be at the root of frightening paranormal activity.(n)

programme.title: Andromeda: The Devil Take the Hindmost
programme.desc: Dylan and Rev Bem help a peaceful society to stand up to their would-be slavers. They have to be careful because if Dylan teaches them to kill, their kids will be born knowing it.(n)

programme.title: Andromeda: The Honey Offering
programme.desc: Dylan attempts to bring peace to two different Nietzschean prides by escorting the princess of one to her arranged marriage to the prince of the other.(n)

programme.title: Andromeda: Star-Crossed
programme.desc: Rommie's avatar falls in love with what turns out to be the avatar of a warship named Gabriel. Gabriel attempts to infect Rommie with a virus that broadcasts its plans to the warship.(n)

programme.title: Andromeda: It Makes a Lovely Light
programme.desc: Beka takes the Andromeda to Tarn-Vedra, but extended time in the slipstream causes side effects. To combat them, Beka starts taking Flash and soon becomes addicted.(n)

programme.title: Andromeda
programme.desc: An old memory from the Andromeda is accidentally activated, which sends her on a mission and leaves Dylan and the crew unable to override the command.(n)

programme.title: Andromeda
programme.desc: Dylan and Rommie must rescue Tyr, Harper and Rev from a Magog Worldship.(n)

programme.title: Judge Judy: Episode 13.161
programme.desc: A 57-year-old man is accused of sexually propositioning a teenage grocery cashier; he sues her for money she allegedly promised to pay back. A teenager sues her father for the return of furniture that she claims was a Christmas gift.(n)

programme.title: Judge Judy: Episode 13.164
programme.desc: Ex-lovers dispute maxed-out credit card from alleged gambling binge. Daughter sues father convicted of domestic violence for unpaid attorney fees.(n)

programme.title: Judge Judy: Episode 13.61
programme.desc: A teenager refuses to take a drug test after denying charges that he smashed a car window and stole a neighbor’s belongings/A female nail technician sues a cosmetologist for money allegedly paid toward an apprenticeship.(n)

programme.title: Judge Judy: Episode 13.127
programme.desc: 11-year-old girl accused of pouring scalding water on 5-year-old boy; mothers fight over liability and medical expenses/A man sues horse trainer for saddle return; granddaughter sold it.(n)

programme.title: Judge Judy: Episode 13.115
programme.desc: Man accuses ex-lover of sending explicit photos/Sued for damaging ex-girlfriend's Mustang in accident.(n)

programme.title: Judge Judy: Episode 13.242
programme.desc: An online romance leads to a lawsuit over unpaid credit card charges, bail for a DUI fine, and excess mileage charges on a leased car. Divorced parents caring for their son after an ATV accident dispute claiming him as a dependent on their tax return.(n)

programme.title: Judge Judy: Episode 13.199
programme.desc: A teen DD falls asleep at the wheel, totaling a car after giving drunk minors a ride. Co-workers moving in together face bed mix-ups, pet issues, and a broken lease.(n)

programme.title: Judge Judy: Episode 13.256
programme.desc: A young woman sues ex-business partner for investment return and legal fees. Another sues ex-friend for VW Jetta balance, disputing key handover. Woman sues ex-boyfriend for utility bills, deposit, and debt.(n)

programme.title: Judge Judy: Episode 13.238
programme.desc: A woman sues her older daughter over a case involving her emancipated teenager. Ex-lovers dispute car payments, insurance, and property return.(n)

programme.title: Judge Judy: Episode 13.85
programme.desc: Two men sue former friends for having them falsely arrested for assault and for making terrorist threats/A woman claims she threw a lawn chair at two men in self-defense; she and her husband sue them for alleged threats and moneyowed.(n)

programme.title: Judge Judy: Episode 13.38
programme.desc: Man's jaw broken at party, misses Thanksgiving dinner, sues assailant/Woman sues ex for TV value, unpaid phone bill; he claims TV sold to unreachable friend.(n)

programme.title: Hell's Kitchen USA
programme.desc: Chef Ramsay announces that Nick, Michelle and Benjamin must design and cook a five-course menu. After tasting them, he announces that all three finalists will move forward.(n)

programme.title: Hell's Kitchen USA
programme.desc: Michelle and Benjamin compete to be the winner of the first ever Hell's Kitchen all-stars, and the head chef at Gordon Ramsay's Hell's Kitchen Restaurant at Caesar's Palace in Las Vegas.(n)

programme.title: Hell's Kitchen USA
programme.desc: Eight former contestants are back to take on eight keen rookies. First up is the signature dish challenge, with the veterans trying to create the rookies' meals and trying to impress Gordon early on.(n)

programme.title: Hell's Kitchen USA
programme.desc: Chef Ramsay announces that he is taking his risotto off of the Hell's Kitchen menu, and the contestants are tasked with preparing their own risotto dish in the hopes of replacing the old one for the remainder of the season.(n)

programme.title: Hell's Kitchen USA
programme.desc: All 15 chefs walk into a dining room filled with Marines, where they find out they will have to cook dishes that represent the air, land and sea. Things take a drastic turn when one chef accuses Chef Ramsay of sabotaging her.(n)

programme.title: Hell's Kitchen USA
programme.desc: Teams are tasked with cooking halibut in seven different ways; a dinner service; an elimination; pianist Stephan Moccio; chef David LeFevre.(n)

programme.title: Undercover Boss USA
programme.desc: Rick Tigner, the president of Kendall-Jackson Wine Estates, the second largest family owned wine company in the world, goes undercover posing as a grocery store employee who is pursuing his dream job in the wine industry.(n)

programme.title: Undercover Boss Canada
programme.desc: CEO Ellis Jacob goes undercover doling out snacks and tickets while assessing how to enhance the moviegoer experience within Canada’s largest motion picture exhibitor across the board.(n)

programme.title: Undercover Boss Canada
programme.desc: The CEO of Canadian restaurant chain East Side Mario’s finds out what it’s really like for the Average Joe when he steps away from financial management to spend a week working undercover in his own kitchens.(n)

programme.title: Undercover Boss USA
programme.desc: Bernt Bodal is the CEO of American Seafoods, one of the largest seafood companies in the United States. He is going undercover to look for ways for the company to grow.(n)

programme.title: Undercover Boss USA
programme.desc: Mark King, the CEO of the world’s top golf equipment brand, Taylor Made, goes undercover as Al Bower, an unemployed golf enthusiast trying to land his dream job in the golf industry.(n)

programme.title: Undercover Boss USA
programme.desc: Harlan Kent is the CEO of the world’s largest candle manufacturer, Yankee Candle. Harlan goes undercover as Dan Johnson, a chef from Cincinnati who was forced to close his restaurant and open up a retail store but has no experience in the field.(n)

programme.title: Operation Repo: It Ain't No Joke!
programme.desc: In this kick-off to the final season, the cast takes viewers back through the most outrageous, comical, and memorable repos of the series. And, get a sneak peek of the final season of Operation Repo.(n)

programme.title: Operation Repo: Unwanted Seizures
programme.desc: First, Lou sends Sonia and Matt to repo a Toyota Corolla from a recently divorced debtor determined to keep the car she won in the divorce. Later, Lou cuts a repo short to send Froy and Matt to tail a car until the debtor realizes he's being followed. And.(n)

programme.title: Operation Repo: Pepper Spray and Guns
programme.desc: First, Froy and Sonia douse a couple with a dose of pepper spray when the debtor gets too pushy with Sonia. Next, Matt and Froy battle biker girls when going after a motorcycle. And Finally, Matt and Froy confront a couple of delinquents.(n)

programme.title: Operation Repo: Who Wants Ice Cream?
programme.desc: First, Sonia, Matt, Froy, and Lou roll up and roll on a gang of brothers to gain possession of an Infinity. Next, Matt and Froy stand in the way of a drugged debtor keeping his car. And finally, it's time for some ice cream for Lou, Froy, and Sonia when..(n)

programme.title: Operation Repo: The Cop, the Pizza Delivery Man, and the Repo Men
programme.sub-title: The Cop, the Pizza Delivery Man, and the Repo Men
programme.desc: First, Lou sends Sonia and Froy out to repo from a pizza delivery man way behind on his payments. Then, Matt and Froy deal with an unhelpful citizen when they have to repossess from a cop. And finally, Sonia, Lyndah, and Matt deal with another repo.(n)

programme.title: Operation Repo: Hairy Situations
programme.desc: First, things get hairy when Sonia and Lyndah repo from outside a wig shop. Next, everybody's crying when Lou and Froy's repossession from a young couple ends with a pepper spray to everyone's face. And finally, Froy, Sonia, and Lou repo the targeted car.(n)

programme.title: Operation Repo starts 9pm
programme.desc: Take a ride along with Operation Repo! This docudrama series takes an in-depth look at the professional, but sometimes murky world of car repossession. Get ready for the drama!(n)

programme.title: Operation Repo starts 9pm
programme.desc: STARTS 9PM Take a ride along with Operation Repo! This docudrama series takes an in-depth look at the professional, but sometimes murky world of car repossession. Get ready for the drama!(n)

programme.title: Operation Repo starts 9pm
programme.desc: STARTS 9PM Take a ride along with Operation Repo! This docudrama series takes an in-depth look at the professional, but sometimes murky world of car repossession. Get ready for the drama!(n)

programme.title: Operation Repo starts 9pm
programme.desc: STARTS 9PM Take a ride along with Operation Repo! This docudrama series takes an in-depth look at the professional, but sometimes murky world of car repossession. Get ready for the drama!(n)

programme.title: Operation Repo starts 9pm
programme.desc: STARTS 9PM Take a ride along with Operation Repo! This docudrama series takes an in-depth look at the professional, but sometimes murky world of car repossession. Get ready for the drama!(n)

programme.title: Operation Repo starts 9pm
programme.desc: Take a ride along with Operation Repo! This docudrama series takes an in-depth look at the professional, but sometimes murky world of car repossession. Get ready for the drama!(n)

programme.title: Operation Repo starts 9pm
programme.desc: STARTS 9PM Take a ride along with Operation Repo! This docudrama series takes an in-depth look at the professional, but sometimes murky world of car repossession. Get ready for the drama!(n)

programme.title: Operation Repo starts 9pm
programme.desc: STARTS 9PM Take a ride along with Operation Repo! This docudrama series takes an in-depth look at the professional, but sometimes murky world of car repossession. Get ready for the drama!(n)

programme.title: Rules of Engagement: The Last of the Red Hat Lovers
programme.sub-title: The Last of the Red Hat Lovers
programme.desc: Russell books a cruise that he thinks is filled with 'red hot' ladies but instead, it's filled with ladies from the Red Hat society. Meanwhile, Timmy tries to help Jeff and Audrey settle an argument.(n)

programme.title: Rules of Engagement: Dirty Talk
programme.desc: Russell tries to get out of his marriage to an overly enthused Liz, who tries to make it work, while Jeff attempts to engage Audrey in dirty talk.(n)

programme.title: Rules of Engagement: Bros Before Nodes
programme.desc: Worried about getting his father's approval, Russell gets Liz all dolled up to meet him.(n)

programme.title: Rules of Engagement: Audrey Is Dumb
programme.desc: Jeff celebrates Audrey's inability to talk after her node removal surgery. Russell gets Timmy to fire an employee for him, and Adam discovers he's only getting free stuff because of his good looks.(n)

programme.title: Rules of Engagement: Nature Calls
programme.desc: Everyone spends a weekend in Vermont to watch the leaves change. During the trip, Adam gets poison ivy on his hands, Jeff has an embarrassing experience on the inn's computer, and Liz begins to realize that her marriage is a sham.(n)

programme.title: Rules of Engagement: Shy Dial
programme.desc: Jeff uses an app on his phone that automatically puts his calls through to Audrey's voicemail. Meanwhile, Adam befriends a clothing salesman who helps him against his friends when he picks up some questionable clothing choices.(n)

programme.title: Rules of Engagement: Cheating
programme.desc: Audrey tries to persuade Jeff to eat healthier when he is diagnosed with high cholesterol, but he can’t help sneaking around with Brenda for unhealthy food.(n)

programme.title: Rules of Engagement: The Chair
programme.desc: Jeff and Audrey engage in a battle of wills when she refuses to admit that she hates the armchair she ordered while Jeff pretends to love it.(n)

programme.title: Rules of Engagement: Scavenger Hunt
programme.desc: To try to show his care and interest in their relationship, Jeff sends Audrey on a scavenger hunt. Russell thinks Jennifer has a sex tape and enlists Timmy's help in finding it.(n)

programme.title: Rules of Engagement: A Big Bust
programme.desc: Audrey believes her maid needs an operation to correct the limp she has to be able to walk better, thinking she is doing the right thing Audrey asks her neighbors to contribute to the cause not having any idea what the money is really intended for.(n)

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: The Montrose Files: The Million Dollar Man Pt. 2
programme.sub-title: The Montrose Files: The Million Dollar Man Pt. 2
programme.desc: Once in Montrose, Dog discovers that the million dollar fugitive is not the young bondsman's only problem. Dog and Beth make it their mission to both clean up the mess and teach him the fundamentals of bondsmanship.(n)

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: The Montrose Files: Round the Clock
programme.sub-title: The Montrose Files: Round the Clock
programme.desc: Dog is committed to saving his new friend's bail bonding business, and now must race against time to bring a rogues gallery to justice in the High Sierra mountain town of Montrose, CO.(n)

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: The Montrose Files: And Then There Were None
programme.sub-title: The Montrose Files: And Then There Were None
programme.desc: With four outlaws still on the lam, Dog sets out to bring 'em in. As day turns into night and with the darkness and the danger mounting, an undaunted Dog and team plan late night hits on the riskiest of locations--their targets' homes.(n)

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: Oh Brother, Where Art Thou?
programme.desc: With a long record of violence and abuse and weighing in at over 200lbs, Dog's target for the day does not sound like a gentle giant. When the trail grows cold Dog turns up the heat on the fugitive's brother and sister.(n)

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: Cap and Gown
programme.desc: Friend of the family, Kili, is joining the team to help track down a runner on the Hawaiian island of Maui. This is not the only thing on their schedule, because after the hunt, Kili has to hurry off to his college graduation ceremony!(n)

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: Spring Pong Cleaning
programme.desc: After Korie decides the junk piles in the Duck Commander warehouse are beginning to reach critical mass, she calls on Willie and the guys to do a little company spring-cleaning.(n)

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: Good Morning, West Monroe
programme.desc: After attending a local radio show as a guest, Willie sees an opportunity to host a show of his own.(n)

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: Of Mattresses and Men
programme.desc: The Jase, Si and the guys from the duck call room take a field trip to a brand new local donut shop and quickly find out who amongst them can eat the most delicious treats.(n)

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: Samurai Si
programme.desc: Willie receives a special gift from a Japanese business associate - a "priceless" samurai sword, which Willie keeps out of the hands of Jase and the guys.(n)

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: Duck No, We Won't Go
programme.desc: Willie pushes his work force too far after implementing new "motivational work tactics," and the guys rise up against him and go on strike.(n)

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: Drag Me To Glory
programme.desc: When NASCAR sensation Clint Bowyer pays a visit to the Duck Commander warehouse, Willie and the guys are fired up to spend the day hanging out with the professional racecar driver.(n)

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: Duck Season Eve
programme.desc: Tomorrow is the opening day of Duck Season and the men are carrying on their tradition of camping on the Robertson Land the night before.(n)

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: Can't Hardly Weight
programme.desc: Gearing up for his high school reunion, Willie realizes that he could stand to lose a few pounds. Jase and Korie set out to help him drop some weight and the strenuous battle of man-versus-waistline begins.(n)

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: Shot Thru The Heart
programme.desc: The guys learn from Willie that John Luke is going through his first break up. In order to make him feel better the men decide to take John Luke hunting for nutria, and impart their relationship wisdom.(n)

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: Here Lizard, Lizard
programme.desc: When the warehouse guys new office pet (a lizard) escapes, they try all they can in order to catch the wily reptile. Proving impossible, the guys finally decide to bring in the big guns to help trap it--Mr. Phil Robertson.(n)

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: Hallu-Si-Nations
programme.desc: With Willie out-of-town, the guys decide to flake off work and leave to brush up the duck blinds on the Robertson land. While out, Si believes he spots what he thinks is the infamous 'Black Panther'.(n)

programme.title: A.I. Rising
programme.desc: The relationship between a human and android spirals out of control with shocking consequences.(n)

programme.title: Timeline: Timeline
programme.desc: Based on the Michael Crichton novel. TIMELINE tells the story of a professor who inadvertently catapults himself back to 14th-century France, in the middle of the 100 Years War.(n)

programme.title: The Last Boy
programme.desc: The world at an end, a dying mother sends her young son on a journey to the place that grants wishes. A fantasy drama inspired by the works of the 13th Century Sufi Mystic and Poet Rumi.(n)

programme.title: Your Highness
programme.desc: When Prince Fabious's bride is kidnapped, he goes on a quest to rescue her... accompanied by his lazy useless brother Thadeous.(n)

programme.title: George And The Dragon
programme.desc: A knight (James Purefoy, "Rome") returning from the Crusades takes on a dragon after the disappearance of the kindly Princess Lunna (Piper Perabo, "Coyote Ugly"). With Patrick Swayze.(n)

programme.title: The Heist
programme.desc: A comedy centered on three museum security guards who devise a plan to steal back the artworks to which they have become attached after they are transferred to another museum. Starring: Morgan Freeman, Christopher Walken, Joseph McKenna, Wynn Everett.(n)

programme.title: Legend of the Red Dragon
programme.desc: A young father and his infant son are beset by forces of evil and corruption. They wander China, upholding their sense of honor and protecting the weak. When they are forced into combat, spectacular and hilarious fast-motion kung fu sequences follow.(n)

programme.title: Blood Out
programme.desc: In the vein of TRAINING DAY, STREET KINGS, and AMERICAN GANGSTER - Curtis 50 CENT Jackson, Val Kilmer, and Vinnie Jones star in a new action packed film filled with good cop/bad cop vengeance!(n)

programme.title: The Intergalactic Adventures of Max Cloud
programme.desc: When video-game enthusiast, Sarah is transported into her favorite game, she finds herself on an intergalactic prison, home to the most dangerous villains in the galaxy.(n)

programme.title: Descent
programme.desc: A team of scientists are gathered to prevent a global catastrophe. But one of the scientists realizes early on that the cause of volcanic reactions is most likely due to a secret government operation investigating alternative energy resources.(n)

programme.title: Holiday in Your Heart
programme.desc: Fourteen-year-old LeAnn Rimes wants nothing more than to sing at the Grand Ole Opry. She is invited to sing at a Christmas concert on Nashville's famous stage, but upon her arrival, she is faced with a difficult decision.(n)

programme.title: Christmas Wedding
programme.desc: A month before their wedding, on Christmas Day, Emily is called away for business. When Emily is due to return, a major storm hits making it impossible for her to leave. Emily desperately tries to make it home while Ben gets his act together.(n)

programme.title: A Bulldog For Christmas
programme.desc: Becky really hates Christmas. But when she is magically transformed into a cute bulldog, she has to learn the meaning of Christmas and get into the holiday spirit or she may never be changed back. An entertaining Christmas film for the whole family.(n)

programme.title: The Christmas Consultant
programme.desc: This Lifetime Original Movie stars David Hasselhoff as a sought after consultant hired by a workaholic mother (Caroline Rhea) in an effort to get her and her family through the holidays.(n)

programme.title: A Sister’s Obsession
programme.desc: Kendra’s life couldn’t be more perfect – she has a loving husband, supportive best friend, and a blossoming career… and she was just awarded the title of "Educator of the Year.(n)

programme.title: Dark Minds
programme.desc: A twisted psychological thriller about a man haunted by his past.(n)

programme.title: Her Boyfriend’s Secret
programme.desc: INSPIRED BY TRUE EVENTS - Renowned interior designer Melissa is drawn into a relationship with a man who has a secret life -- another wife and family. She soon meets another innocent victim and learns her man is more than duplicitous, he’s a killer!(n)

programme.title: The Aviator
programme.desc: During the 1930s and '40s, wealthy industrialist Howard Hughes (Leonardo DiCaprio) gains fame as a movie producer, airplane designer and pilot.(n)

programme.title: Megan Leavey
programme.desc: Young Marine Cpl. Megan Leavey starts to identify with Rex, a particularly aggressive combat dog that she trains. Together, they complete more than 100 missions until an improvised explosive device injures both, putting their fates in jeopardy.(n)

programme.title: Angel And The Badman
programme.desc: Quirt Evans, an all round bad guy, is nursed back to health and sought after by Penelope Worth, a Quaker girl. He eventually finds himself having to choose between his world and the world Penelope lives in. Starring: John Wayne, Gail Russell, Harry Carey.(n)

programme.title: John Wayne: Stagecoach Run
programme.desc: A man runs afoul of the villain who attempts to cheat him out of a lucrative mail delivery contract. In Vibrant Color! Starring: John Wayne, Phyllis Fraser, Lew Kelly.(n)

programme.title: Death Valley Days: The Deserters
programme.desc: When five men desert the Union Army, they are at the mercy of General Avery, who favors shooting them.(n)

programme.title: Death Valley Days: Queen of Spades
programme.desc: Mary likes the attention of many men, but that soon causes troubles the town when one is murdered over her.(n)

programme.title: Death Valley Days: The Holdup-Proof Safe
programme.desc: The holdup-proof safe in Gus Lammerson's store proves anything but.(n)

programme.title: K9 Legend Of The Lost Gold
programme.desc: When Kassie and her friends stumble across an old, broken pocket watch they begin an unexpected journey to unlock the secret of the legendary Garrison Gold. They'll have to solve clues to find the lost treasure.(n)

programme.title: The Stolen Princess
programme.desc: In the age of knights, princesses and sorcerers, Ruslan embarks on a quest for his stolen princess and to prove, that love is stronger than magic.(n)

programme.title: Captain Sabertooth
programme.desc: The orphan boy Pinky follows the Captain on an exciting and dangerous journey across the big oceans to the kingdom of Lama Rama, hunting for a treasure and the answer to who is Pinky's father.(n)

programme.title: Airplane Mode
programme.desc: Horny American teenagers fly to Australia for sex at the social media convention in Sydney. Will Logan survive his fear of flying? Will the pilots survive passengers not using airplane mode? Will anyone survive? Feat: Logan Paul.(n)

programme.title: The Chaperone
programme.desc: Ray’s been asked to chaperone a school trip with his daughter Sally’s class. When characters from Ray’s criminal past believe he stole the loot from a bank they robbed, Ray will do whatever it takes to keep his daughter and her class out of harms way.(n)

programme.title: Olympic Dreams
programme.desc: In this heart-warming romantic comedy, an athlete and volunteer form an unexpected bond at the Olympic Games.(n)

programme.title: Sapphire
programme.desc: In 1950s London racial hostility to Commonwealth immigrants is openly paraded. Scotland Yard detectives probe the racially motivated murder of a young woman.(n)

programme.title: Fright
programme.desc: A baby sitter is terrorised by a homicidal maniac who's escaped from a mental institution to kill his ex-wife.(n)

programme.title: Demons of the Mind
programme.desc: A history of inherited insanity spells trouble for a 19th-century nobleman suspected of a series of grisly murders.(n)

programme.title: New Twilight Zone: The Leprechaun Artist/Dead Run
programme.desc: Vacationing in the United States, an Irish leprechaun is caught by three boys. To be freed, he must grant them three wishes/A truck driver accepts a job to deliver souls to Hell.(n)

programme.title: New Twilight Zone: The Crossing
programme.desc: A stressed-out priest repeatedly encounters a station wagon containing a young girl. The car keeps crashing and bursting into flames.(n)

programme.title: New Twilight Zone: The Hunters
programme.desc: A young boy falls into an undiscovered cave near a housing project. An archeologist studies strange paintings on its walls and then bizarre things begin to happen. Cave items move around and animals are killed and brought into the cave.(n)

programme.title: New Twilight Zone: Dream Me a Life
programme.desc: A man in a retirement home dreams of a woman holding back a monster, and in real life realizes the woman is his cataleptic neighbor.(n)

programme.title: New Twilight Zone: Memories
programme.desc: A hypnotist who specializes in helping people relive their past lives tries to find her own history. She hypnotizes herself and when she awakens, she learns that everyone can now remember their past lives. They also desperately want to forget them.(n)

programme.title: Relic Hunter: The Star of Nadir
programme.desc: An anonymous Sultan's wife Danielle dies in mysterious circumstances in the desert. However, she had called for Sydney to help. Sydney believes Danielle was searching for the Star of Nadir.(n)

programme.title: Relic Hunter: Devil Doll
programme.desc: A guide leads Sydney and Nigel to an unusual, underground Aztec burial chamber. Instead of a body, they find a relic.(n)

programme.title: Sanctuary: Sanctuary For All Pt 2
programme.desc: The enigmatic Dr. Helen Magnus recruits an insightful forensic psychiatrist Will Zimmerman (ROBIN DUNNE) to join her in the quest to track, study and protect the strange, and often terrifying creatures that secretly populate our world. Part 2.(n)

programme.title: Sanctuary: Fata Morgana
programme.desc: Dr. Helen Magnus, her daughter Ashley, and new to the Sanctuary, Dr. Will Zimmerman release three women from a mysterious crypt in Scotland, bringing them back to the Sanctuary for refuge.(n)

programme.title: Sanctuary: Folding Man
programme.desc: An investigation into a string of bizarre robberies leads Magnus and Will to a crime ring of thieves who seem to be able to slip between the cracks of the law…literally.(n)

programme.title: Flash Gordon Conquers the Universe: The Purple Red
programme.desc: Flash Gordon, Dale Arden and Dr. Zarkov return to the planet Mongo for an antidote to the Purple Death, which wreaking destruction on Earth. However, Ming the Merciless has other plans for them.(n)

programme.title: Flash Gordon Conquers the Universe: The Pool of Peril
programme.desc: Flash Gordon, Dale Arden and Dr. Zarkov return to the planet Mongo for an antidote to the Purple Death, which wreaking destruction on Earth. However, Ming the Merciless has other plans for them.(n)

programme.title: Flash Gordon Conquers the Universe: Doom of the Dictator
programme.desc: Flash Gordon, Dale Arden and Dr. Zarkov return to the planet Mongo for an antidote to the Purple Death, which wreaking destruction on Earth. However, Ming the Merciless has other plans for them.(n)

programme.title: The Lost World: True Spirit
programme.desc: Veronica and Marguerite use a ouija board to communicate with Malone, who Veronica believes is trapped in a spirit realm. However, their attempt may have aroused the spirit of Saros, a dead warlord.(n)

programme.title: Auction Hunters: The Chicago Grand Slam
programme.desc: 1984 Yamaha SS440 Snowmobile that introduced the revolutionary shock absorber suspension; rare autographed 1920s baseball glove; mint Hank Aaron signed baseball; authentic 1950s Robby the Robot collector toy.(n)

programme.title: Auction Hunters: Little-Ton Jones
programme.desc: Allen & Ton try to get the inside scoop on their competition by chatting up local auction buyers. The guys find some heavy gold-mining machinery from the 1950s & an amateur rocket that can travel faster than the speed of sound!(n)

programme.title: Auction Hunters: Fire in the Hole!
programme.desc: 1930s "blasting machine" dynamite detonator box; 1890s treasure chest with secret compartments. Ton smelts jewelry to forge bricks of silver.(n)

programme.title: Auction Hunters: The Dallas Mavericks
programme.desc: Military-grade Tomahawk cruise missile jet engine; century-old handcrafted wild west cowboy saddle; 1960s high roller's gold money.(n)

programme.title: Auction Hunters: Gangster Whiskey
programme.desc: Allen and Ton trek to an auction in Moreno Valley, CA, where two locker wins yield a vintage jukebox, a valuable baseball card and a Prohibition-era moonshine still.(n)

programme.title: Auction Hunters: Ton's Driller Instinct
programme.desc: Ton & Allen encounter aggressive outdoorsmen in the Alaskan wilderness. The guys discover an 8-wheeled ATV that travels on both land & water and an air percussion hammer that can drill through solid rock!(n)

programme.title: Auction Hunters: Voodoo Moola
programme.desc: Allen & Ton hit a storage auction in Louisiana's Capitol City and quickly find themselves in trouble with the law! The guys uncover a pair of racing lawnmowers and then stumble on an antique barber chair from the early 1900s!(n)

programme.title: Auction Hunters: Sin City Shootout
programme.desc: 1953 Chevy-inspired bumper car; scores of M16 30-round magazines; reproduction 1940s boardwalk photobooth; aerosol-powered spud gun potato launchers.(n)

programme.title: Auction Hunters: Great American Cashtime
programme.desc: Rare 1950s Master Pitch baseball machine; 1980s Jaws of Life tool used by rescuers to pry open cars.(n)

programme.title: Auction Hunters: Home on the Gun Range
programme.desc: Barely making it to an auction in Corona, CA, Allen and Ton buy an overstuffed unit and find an antique crossbow, a rare 10-gauge Winchester shotgun and a 1940s Kiss-o-Meter.(n)

programme.title: Auction Hunters: Cold Hard Cash
programme.desc: Ton and Allen go North to Alaska and get a cold reception from the local auctioneer. They find two enormous seaplane pontoons and a pair of Smith & Wesson revolvers, including the most powerful production handgun in the world!(n)
